attributes.action: Ask the Metropolitan Police to investigate all fraudulent expenses claims by Members of Parliament with a view to criminal prosecution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is very clear that many MP's expenses claims do not fit the requirement that items must be necessary for the performance of their duty. Just as prosecutions would be brought against members of the public in these circumstances, so Members of Parliament should be subject to the same laws and penalties.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
